aththanagalla raja maha wiharaya, amerikawe hiyustan bauddha wiharaya , thayiwanaye therawada bauddha wiharaya athulu wiharayanhi adhipathi syamopali wanshika maha nikaye malwathu maha wihara parshwayesinadi siwu koralaye pradhana sanghanayakanawa upadhyaya dhurandara aacharya pannila shri aananda na himi aththanagalla rajamaha wiharadhipathi sinadi siw koralaye pradhana sangha nayaka aacharya pannila shri aananda nayaka sthawirayan wahanse wetha ape malwathu maha wiharayiya garuthara karaka maha sangha sabhawen upadhyaya dhurayak pirinamima nimithi karagena subhashinsana paniwidayak nikuth karanu labanne imahath sathutini.warthamana bhikshu parapure dana ugath aadarshawath bhikshuwak hatiyata aththanagalla rajamaha wiharaya mul karagena deshiya ha wideshiya washayen sidukaragena yanu labana aagamika, jathika, samajayiya sewawa itha prashansaniyaya.wisheshayen ape malwathu maha wiharayata hithapakshapathiwa parani shasanika sampradayan aaraksha karamin ha anugamanaya karamin shramana sarupya aakalpayangen yukthawa, sambuddha shasanaye chirasthithiya udesa udara mehewaraka niyali sitina upadhyaya dhurandara aacharya pannila shri aananda nayaka sthawirayanta ema sadkaryayan thawaduratath karagena yamata theruwan saranin ha siri dalada samindu pihiten aayurarogya sampath siddhawewayi aashinsanaya karamha.maha wiharawanshika syamopali maha nikaye mahanayaka mahanuwara uposhitha pushparama wiharadwayadhipathi thibbatuwawe shri siddhartha sumangala maha na himideshiya ha wideshiyawa dharma pracharaka katayuthuwala yedemin, wenath samaja sathkaraka katayuthuwalada yedena,ugath sanghaya wahansela athara pramukhasthanayaka wajambaena athipujya pannila shri aanandabhidhana nayaka himipanan , malwathu maha wihara parshwaye upadhyaya padawiyakata pathkaranu labima pilibanda awasthawata paniwidayak nikuth kirimada sathutata karunaki.shri lankawa thula pamanak nowa samastha lokaya purama gaurawadarayata pathrawemin, lokaye boho ratawala bauddha janathawa athara kirthi namayak dinagath sangha pithrun wahanse namak wana garu katayuthu pannila aananda nahimiyo , methek sidukarana lada shasanika ha samaja sathkaraya athiwishishtaya.
